content: Abraham Bernstein | Department of Informatics | UZH Skip navigation Abraham Bernstein, Prof., PhD Head Dynamic and Distributed Information Systems Group Director UZH Digital Society Initiative Phone +41 44 635 45 79 Address Department of Informatics, Binzmühlestrasse 14, CH-8050 Zürich Room number BIN 2.D.06 E-Mail Website Website2 Professor Abraham Bernstein, Ph.D. Head, Dynamic and Distributed Information Systems Group Director, UZH Digital Society Initiative Department of Informatics University of Zurich Binzmühlestrasse 14 CH-8050 Zürich, Switzerland Room: BIN 2.D.06 Phone: +41 44 635 45 79 Email:  Admin contact: Erica Maurer, Phone: + 41 44 635 43 11, Email Erica Maurer FOAF: FOAF-File (RDF, 1 KB) I am a Full Professor at the Department of Informatics (Institut für Informatik) of the University of Zurich. I mainly conduct research on the Semantic Web and Knowledge Discovery. My work draws from both social science (organizational psychology/sociology) and technical (computer science, artificial intelligence) foundations. Before coming to Zurich I was an Assistant Professor, at the Information Systems Department of New York University's Stern School of Business, and received a Ph.D. at MIT's Sloan School of Management, where I worked with Prof. Thomas W. Malone at the Center for Coordination Science. Research Interests Semantic Web Human Interaction with the Semantic Web Triple Stores / Graph Stores (incl.
